attributes.additional_details: We ask for full details of all projects undertaken by Military Intelligence in all its forms (both predating and post dating the formation of The Ministry of Defence) of all projects run in cooporation with extraterrestrial entities or extraterrestrial organisations. In addition to properly informing the British public of these activities we ask for full disclosure directly to those members of the public who took part in such projects plus full compensation to those participants who have suffered problems as a result.
